description: The area under the histogram between −160 and −43 is

questions.name: histogram_area
questions.title: The area under the histogram between −160 and −43 is (Enter as a percentage)

validators.text: Please enter a value between 49.9% and 50.1%.

questions.description: The answer is 50%: type the endpoints into the boxes in the histogram tool.
